clique_number.name: Clique number
clique_number.description: Checks if the clique number (size of the largest clique) is equal to the given value.

diameter.name: Diameter
diameter.description: Checks if the diameter (length of the longest path) is equal to the given value.

girth.name: Girth
girth.description: Checks if the girth (length of the shortest cycle) is equal to the given value.

independence_number.name: Independence number
independence_number.description: Checks if the independence number (size of the largest independent set) is equal to the given value.

isomorphism.name: Isomorphism
isomorphism.description: Checks if the graph is isomorphic to the sample answer (that is, if it is identical to the sample answer, up to reordering vertices).

radius.name: Radius
radius.description: Checks if the radius (minimum eccentricity) is equal to the given value.
